item.title: About
item.description: I am a third-year PhD student in Statistics at University of Padova (Cycle XXXIV), my supervisor is Prof. Antonio Canale. My research interests mainly concern Bayesian modeling of complex data, Bayesian nonparametrics and computational statistics. Education PhD in Statistical Sciences (ongoing), University of Padova M.S. in Statistical Sciences B.S. in Statistics, Economics and Finance

item.title: Contact
item.description: Department of Statistical Sciences University of Padova Via Cesare Battisti 241 35121 Padova, Italy Email laura.dangelo.1@phd.unipd.it dangelo@stat.unipd.it

item.title: Resume
item.description: Current position Since October 2018; (expected completion: December 2021) PhD student in Statistical Science, University of Padova Supervisor: Prof. Antonio Canale Co-supervisor: Prof. Michele Guindani. Education Master’s Degree in Statistics (10/2015 – 11/2017), University of Padova Title of dissertation: Modelli Bayesiani nonparametrici: applicazioni al settore assicurativo (Bayesian nonparametric models: applications in insurance)Supervisor: Prof. Antonio CanaleFinal mark: 110/110 cum laude.Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics, Economics and Finance (10/2012 – 09/2015), University of PadovaTitle of dissertation: L’area sotto la curva ROC specifica per caratteristiche (Covariate-specific area under the ROC curve)Supervisor: Prof.
